title: Improved ScriptureMasteryHelper
message:
Improved ScriptureMasteryHelper

Now it takes a Runnable and runs it once the scriptures are loaded. This
allows the scripture lists to properly refresh when the scripture
mastery scriptures are imported. It also has an option to remove all
scriptures that are contained in a certain SM list.

title: Added "Mark as 'Completed'" action
message:
Added "Mark as 'Completed'" action

In the ScriptureViewActivity, users can now change the category of a
scripture. This is also available from the context menu in the scripture
list.

title: Fixed CoordinatorLayout bug
message:
Fixed CoordinatorLayout bug

So it seems that the CoordinatorLayout, because it's a FrameLayout,
which is traditionally used to stack views on top of one another,
doesn't do a very good job of arranging views linearly and assigning
them with proper heights. Hence the ViewPager was too tall for the
screen making part of it extend below the bottom edge of the activity
window. To solve this I wrapped the AppBarLayout and the ViewPager in a
LinearLayout nested inside the CoordinatorLayout.

title: Fixed crash bug in ScriptureViewActivity
message:
Fixed crash bug in ScriptureViewActivity

If it is ever launched without a scripture in the intent, it should
finish() and return. It was only finishing, not returning, so it was
still trying to operate with a null Scripture, hence the crash. I
received a couple crash reports about this through the dev console.

title: Added "context menu" to app widget. VERSION 1.1
message:
Added "context menu" to app widget. VERSION 1.1

as well as to view, memorize, or add note to the scripture.
